name: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin
summary: Conquest Tactics: Realm of Sin is a dark fantasy roguelite with hex-based, turn-based tactical combat. Command your forces, make impactful choices, and navigate a realm consumed by sin—will you restore order or surrender to darkness?
